messages.message:
:moneybag: :moneybag: :moneybag:
Hi all!

If you are working on any branches based on a *major release*, please merge that base release branch into your dev branch at your earliest convenience. :slightly_smiling_face:

I’ve just merged a backport that will cause all sandbox-deployed services - excepting `model-service` and `model-training-tasks-gpu`  for now - to be built on EC2 Jenkins nodes instead of GCP nodes.

Merging the latest release branch commits into your dev branches will cause your subsequent sandbox builds + deploys to happen on EC2, where we get substantial discounts and will save a chunk of $$$. :slightly_smiling_face:

Thank you!
You might also want to exclude Ray head and Ray model training worker if you want an isolation for the model related services.

Ah, I should clarify, we only left out model-service and training tasks because the image is so large that the `docker push` tends to time out from AWS -> GCR
Fortunately we’ve not seen that on others, as far as I know, and we’ve been running everything but these two services on EC2 builders for about 10 days :+1:
